overview: See and learn what real firearms and bullets will and won't do. Forget the Hollywood nonsense. Machine guns, shotguns, assault rifles, and pistols are demonstrated and explained. Will a bullet really knock a man down? Which bullets will penetrate a car door? How quiet is a real silencer? How effective is full-auto fire? This program is used by thousands of law enforcement and military agencies.
title: Deadly Weapons:  Firearms and Firepower
